column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If I may diverge a moment
column2: from croissants back to relationships...the most fruitful seem to be symbiotic
column3: consisting of constant tug and pull
column5: with one entity never dominating the other. A bit of sweet pastry juxtaposed against bitter espresso with a view of Dunlavy Blvd under Houston's unrelenting sun. The drip of sweat down my black v-neck
column6: how I lament that those I love are not here. How bittersweet. How perfect Common Bond exemplifies life. Be it lump blue crab over avocado toast
column8: its velvety farm egg yolk spilling over gruyere...Oh
column9: how I spill over for Common Bond.
